# Chameleon Stride (Spell)
## Overview
[[Illusion Spells|Illusion]] ([[Glamer Spells|glamer]])

**Level: [[2nd Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 2]]**

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Advanced Player's Guide, pg. 210

You fade into the background, and while you are not truly invisible, you are hard to pinpoint due to your translucent state. While under the effects of this spell, you gain a +4 bonus on [[Stealth (Skill)|Stealth]] checks and have concealment from creatures more than 5 feet away (attacks have a 20% miss chance).
